ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] So quiet nowadays.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, then I shld be able to cast wiz 58 eye spell (invis eye).  Can ask for me which wall shld I cast the eye (best if can provide loc, hehe)?  Also need to
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, then I shld be able to cast wiz 58 eye spell (invis eye). Can ask for
me which wall shld I cast the eye (best if can provide loc, hehe)? Also
need to know if the casting spot is safe or not. If not, mobs may attack
me when casting spell.

Btw, are KK mobs 100% aggro (ie aggro regardless of lvl) or won't aggro if
ya lvl is high 50ish (eg 58-60)?

Anyway worst case if kena train, can easily zone out right?


Thx again.

On 27 April, 2001 2:36 PM, kctan@...
[SMTP:kctan@...] wrote:
>
>
> 1. Our guild wizzy do the pulling, I am not sure how they do it. All I
know they
> cast the eye at zone in, and next moment BAM! Phinigel at zone ! =)
>
> 2. Not sure, best bet is to get a Sorcerer to do it. There has been train
to
> zone in with Phinigel before, I think it's pulled by a lower level
wizard.
>
> 3. Don't really get what u mean here.
>
> 4. If I am not wrong, SG is not up until all SS is killed. Only Phinigel
see
> invis when it's full pop.
>
> 5. Right at zone in, u should be able to see the msg.
>
> 6. Should be okie, but not tested.
>
> Damuo, a monk without a god.
> Divine Grace
> Erollisi Marr
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
> "K. W. Lee" <kw.lee@...> on 27/04/2001 01:53:11 PM
>
> Please respond to sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com
>
>
>
> To: "'sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com'"
> <sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com>
>
> cc: (bcc: Terence Tan/IHL-HQ/SIN/IHL)
>
>
>
> Subject RE: [sg-everquest] So quiet nowadays.
> :
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
> 1. If using eye method, where shld I cast eye? I mean against which
wall?
>
> 2. If PA kill my eye and come for me, will it train along the way (prolly
> won't, so fr nvr heard this, but better double check, hehe) to zone in?
>
> 3. No aggro = no summon right?
>
> 4. Only PA and guardian see my invis eye? How abt SS etc?
>
> 5. How deep from zone in do I have to swim in b4 I can hear PA casting?
Or
> I can hear it casting JUST zone in? How long do I normally have to wait
to
> see it cast (5 min or 10min)?
>
> 6. Wonder if it works with 2 tanks (warr and rog/mnk), 1 enc (c2, arg), 1
> shm (speed, slow, dot), clr (heal/rez) and wiz (to loot, hehe).
>
> Thx.
>
>
>
> On 27 April, 2001 11:55 AM, kctan@...
> [SMTP:kctan@...] wrote:
> >
> >
> > I would bring 3 Melees, 1 Shaman, 1 Wizzy and 1 Cleric. Might want to
> bring an
> > enchanter for C2.
> >
> > You will see PA casting when she's up at zone in.
> >
> > Lvl 60 puller invis up, go to centre of spire and drop down, Once u see
> PA
> > casting, swim up and ask ur mage to CoTH. Then run back to see whether
PA
> is
> > alone out of her lair. If so, just pull her back. But I prefer to use
> just the
> > eye to pull to zone in. Much easier and faster. Any danger just zone
out.
> >
> >
> > Damuo, a monk without a god.
> > Divine Grace

> > What is balance grp? Like what Alvin said, PA and its kakis got high
MR,
> > and I think SS cannot be stunned or merz. How many HP PA got? If 1
> > balance grp of 55+ can drop it, then isn't it quite easy to farm? hehe.
> >
> > Btw, sure can hear PA casting xxxx at zone in? If yes then I just park
> > druid there to monitor k liao, thx ;)
> >
> > Btw, I thot Mage COH will clear aggro? If clear aggro liao, how to
pull

> > out?

> > >
> > > 4. not really, just watch ur water breathing.
> > >
> > > 5. no need track, just zone in and if she's up. u can see the msg
she's

> > > Just to make some noise here: Need tips to kill PA in Kedge Keep with

> > > team:
> > >
> > > 1. What is the best combo of this team, average lvl?
> > > 2. Is the eye pulling method a bannable offence (ie use eye spell to
> pull
> > > PA to zone in).
> > > 3. Alternatively is to invis all the way to ledge, how siong is it to
> > kill
> > > the 4 SS, guardians and PA?
> > > 4. Anything to watch out when fighting PA and its kakis?

> > > skill, I wonder if he can track PA from zone in or have to swim
deeper
> to
> > > track? Is it true that all mobs in KK cannot see invis except
> guardians
> > > and PA? Is there any safe room near PA where I can invis a druid and
> > park
> > > there to check if PA is up? If k, then it's better to track 1st then
> > call
> > > grp than the other way round.
